dmca.title: FW: [Ticket#2007040510001719] DMCA ISP Notification www.bespbuypcs.com /Sony Mobile [
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Friday, April 06, 2007 11:44 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: FW: [Ticket#2007040510001719] DMCA ISP Notification www.bespbuypcs.com
/Sony Mobile [ThePl [...]

4/4/2007 

Gabay Moses
1621-25 Old York Rd
Abington PA 19001

Re:  Unauthorized Use of Sony's Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials

Dear Sir or Madam:

Sony has retained Net Enforcers, Inc. to assist with the protection and enforcement
of Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, and other copyrighted material
(referred to in this letter as "Sony Works").   Net Enforcers has in turn retained
us to contact you with respect to this matter.  

Sony believes that you have infringed upon its intellectual property rights by
performing or allowing to be performed some or all of the following actions,
specifically with respect to Mobile products sold by Sony's Personal Mobile Imaging
Division : (1) improperly obtaining a copy of the Sony Works; (2) creating
derivative works from Sony Works; (3) illegally reproducing the Sony Works; (4)
illegally distributing the Sony Works; (5) illegally utilizing Sony's trademarks in
violation of 15 U.S.C.
